Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

What are you going to do yesterday? 

  o Have a hot cup of soup. 
  o Stay on the computer the whole day. 
  o Rob a bank. 
  o WHO ARE YOU AND HOW DO YOU KNOW MY NAME!?!?... 
  o Hmm...JUME! 
  o It's a secret! 
  o Purchase a cute veiled chameleon. 
  o I SMELL CHEESE! 
  o BEEFY! 
  o I'm itchy!!!! MAKE IT STOP!!! WWWHHHHYYYY!!! AHAHAHA!!!.... 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
